name: twitter-video-dl-node
description: This project is based on the original code of the [7rikazhexde / twitter-video-dl-for-sc](https://github.com/7rikazhexde/twitter-video-dl-for-sc) project, which allows users to download X(Twitter) App videos as MP4 files using Node.js, URLs without the need for API keys.
author: 7rikaz_h785 <7rikaz.h785.stat2ltas41lcijad@gmail.com>
